blocks.name: pjorthi
blocks.content: Projection components on orthocomplemented subspaces are orthogonal. (Contributed by NM, 26-Oct-1999.) (New usage is discouraged.)
blocks.origin:
thm pjorthi(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, cch), wceq(co(cfv(cfv(cpjh, c0), c1), csp, cfv(cfv(cpjh, cfv(cort, c0)), c2)), nat0))
  -| wcel(c1, chba)
  -| wcel(c2, chba)
} = {
  sylc(wcel(c0, cch), wceq(co(cfv(cfv(cpjh, c0), c1), csp, cfv(cfv(cpjh, cfv(cort, c0)), c2)), nat0), wcel(c0, csh), wa(wcel(cfv(cfv(cpjh, c0), c1), c0), wcel(cfv(cfv(cpjh, cfv(cort, c0)), c2), cfv(cort, c0))))
  chsh(c0)
  jca(wcel(c0, cch), wcel(cfv(cfv(cpjh, c0), c1), c0), wcel(cfv(cfv(cpjh, cfv(cort, c0)), c2), cfv(cort, c0)))
  mpan2(wcel(c0, cch), wcel(cfv(cfv(cpjh, c0), c1), c0), wcel(c1, chba))
  axpjcl(c0, c1)
  sylancl(wcel(c0, cch), wcel(cfv(cfv(cpjh, cfv(cort, c0)), c2), cfv(cort, c0)), wcel(cfv(cort, c0), cch), wcel(c2, chba))
  choccl(c0)
  axpjcl(cfv(cort, c0), c2)
  shocorth(c0, cfv(cfv(cpjh, c0), c1), cfv(cfv(cpjh, cfv(cort, c0)), c2))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm pjorthi(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  ⊢ (c0 ∈ CH →(((projh ` c0)` c1)[.ih]((projh `(_|_ ` c0))` c2))= 0)
  ⊣ c1 ∈ ~H
  ⊣ c2 ∈ ~H
} = {
  sylc(c0 ∈ CH, (((projh ` c0)` c1)[.ih]((projh `(_|_ ` c0))` c2))= 0, c0 ∈ SH, (((projh ` c0)` c1)∈ c0 ∧((projh `(_|_ ` c0))` c2)∈(_|_ ` c0)))
  chsh(c0)
  jca(c0 ∈ CH, ((projh ` c0)` c1)∈ c0, ((projh `(_|_ ` c0))` c2)∈(_|_ ` c0))
  mpan2(c0 ∈ CH, ((projh ` c0)` c1)∈ c0, c1 ∈ ~H)
  axpjcl(c0, c1)
  sylancl(c0 ∈ CH, ((projh `(_|_ ` c0))` c2)∈(_|_ ` c0), (_|_ ` c0)∈ CH, c2 ∈ ~H)
  choccl(c0)
  axpjcl((_|_ ` c0), c2)
  shocorth(c0, ((projh ` c0)` c1), ((projh `(_|_ ` c0))` c2))
}

blocks.name: pjch1
blocks.content: Property of identity projection. Remark in [Beran] p. 111. (Contributed by NM, 28-Oct-1999.) (New usage is discouraged.)
blocks.origin:
thm pjch1(class c0) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, chba), wceq(cfv(cfv(cpjh, chba), c0), c0))
} = {
  ibi(wcel(c0, chba), wceq(cfv(cfv(cpjh, chba), c0), c0))
  dedth(c0, c0v, wcel(c0, chba), wb(wcel(c0, chba), wceq(cfv(cfv(cpjh, chba), c0), c0)), wb(wcel(cif(c0, c0v, wcel(c0, chba)), chba), wceq(cfv(cfv(cpjh, chba), cif(c0, c0v, wcel(c0, chba))), cif(c0, c0v, wcel(c0, chba)))))
  bibi12d(wceq(c0, cif(c0, c0v, wcel(c0, chba))), wcel(c0, chba), wceq(cfv(cfv(cpjh, chba), c0), c0), wcel(cif(c0, c0v, wcel(c0, chba)), chba), wceq(cfv(cfv(cpjh, chba), cif(c0, c0v, wcel(c0, chba))), cif(c0, c0v, wcel(c0, chba))))
  eleq1(c0, cif(c0, c0v, wcel(c0, chba)), chba)
  eqeq12d(cfv(cfv(cpjh, chba), c0), c0, cfv(cfv(cpjh, chba), cif(c0, c0v, wcel(c0, chba))), cif(c0, c0v, wcel(c0, chba)), wceq(c0, cif(c0, c0v, wcel(c0, chba))))
  fveq2(c0, cif(c0, c0v, wcel(c0, chba)), cfv(cpjh, chba))
  id(wceq(c0, cif(c0, c0v, wcel(c0, chba))))
  pjchi(cif(c0, c0v, wcel(c0, chba)), chba)
  helch()
  ifhvhv0(c0)
}

  ⊢ (c0 ∈ ~H →((projh ` ~H)` c0)= c0)
} = {
  ibi(c0 ∈ ~H, ((projh ` ~H)` c0)= c0)
  dedth(c0, c0v, c0 ∈ ~H, (c0 ∈ ~H ↔((projh ` ~H)` c0)= c0), (if(c0 ∈ ~H, c0, 0h)∈ ~H ↔((projh ` ~H)` if(c0 ∈ ~H, c0, 0h))= if(c0 ∈ ~H, c0, 0h)))
  bibi12d(c0 = if(c0 ∈ ~H, c0, 0h), c0 ∈ ~H, ((projh ` ~H)` c0)= c0, if(c0 ∈ ~H, c0, 0h)∈ ~H, ((projh ` ~H)` if(c0 ∈ ~H, c0, 0h))= if(c0 ∈ ~H, c0, 0h))
  eleq1(c0, if(c0 ∈ ~H, c0, 0h), chba)
  eqeq12d(((projh ` ~H)` c0), c0, ((projh ` ~H)` if(c0 ∈ ~H, c0, 0h)), if(c0 ∈ ~H, c0, 0h), c0 = if(c0 ∈ ~H, c0, 0h))
  fveq2(c0, if(c0 ∈ ~H, c0, 0h), (projh ` ~H))
  id(c0 = if(c0 ∈ ~H, c0, 0h))

blocks.name: pjo
blocks.content: The orthogonal projection. Lemma 4.4(i) of [Beran] p. 111. (Contributed by NM, 30-Oct-1999.) (New usage is discouraged.)
blocks.origin:
thm pjo(class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cch), wcel(c1, chba)), wceq(cfv(cfv(cpjh, cfv(cort, c0)), c1), co(cfv(cfv(cpjh, chba), c1), cmv, cfv(cfv(cpjh, c0), c1))))
} = {
  eqcomd(cfv(cfv(cpjh, cfv(cort, c0)), c1), co(cfv(cfv(cpjh, chba), c1), cmv, cfv(cfv(cpjh, c0), c1)), wa(wcel(c0, cch), wcel(c1, chba)))
  mpbird(wa(wcel(c0, cch), wcel(c1, chba)), wceq(co(cfv(cfv(cpjh, chba), c1), cmv, cfv(cfv(cpjh, c0), c1)), cfv(cfv(cpjh, cfv(cort, c0)), c1)), wceq(co(cfv(cfv(cpjh, c0), c1), cva, cfv(cfv(cpjh, cfv(cort, c0)), c1)), cfv(cfv(cpjh, chba), c1)))
  eqtr2d(co(cfv(cfv(cpjh, c0), c1), cva, cfv(cfv(cpjh, cfv(cort, c0)), c1)), cfv(cfv(cpjh, chba), c1), c1, wa(wcel(c0, cch), wcel(c1, chba)))
  adantl(wcel(c0, cch), wcel(c1, chba), wceq(cfv(cfv(cpjh, chba), c1), c1))
  pjch1(c1)
  axpjpj(c0, c1)
  syl3anc(wa(wcel(c0, cch), wcel(c1, chba)), wb(wceq(co(cfv(cfv(cpjh, chba), c1), cmv, cfv(cfv(cpjh, c0), c1)), cfv(cfv(cpjh, cfv(cort, c0)), c1)), wceq(co(cfv(cfv(cpjh, c0), c1), cva, cfv(cfv(cpjh, cfv(cort, c0)), c1)), cfv(cfv(cpjh, chba), c1))), wcel(cfv(cfv(cpjh, chba), c1), chba), wcel(cfv(cfv(cpjh, c0), c1), chba), wcel(cfv(cfv(cpjh, cfv(cort, c0)), c1), chba))
  adantl(wcel(c0, cch), wcel(c1, chba), wcel(cfv(cfv(cpjh, chba), c1), chba))
  pjcli(c1, chba)
  helch()
  pjhcl(c0, c1)
  sylan(wcel(c0, cch), wcel(c1, chba), wcel(cfv(cfv(cpjh, cfv(cort, c0)), c1), chba), wcel(cfv(cort, c0), cch))
  choccl(c0)
  pjhcl(cfv(cort, c0), c1)
  hvsubadd(cfv(cfv(cpjh, chba), c1), cfv(cfv(cpjh, c0), c1), cfv(cfv(cpjh, cfv(cort, c0)), c1))
}

  eqtr2d((((projh ` c0)` c1)[+h]((projh `(_|_ ` c0))` c1)), ((projh ` ~H)` c1), c1, (c0 ∈ CH ∧ c1 ∈ ~H))
  adantl(c0 ∈ CH, c1 ∈ ~H, ((projh ` ~H)` c1)= c1)
  pjch1(c1)
  axpjpj(c0, c1)
  syl3anc((c0 ∈ CH ∧ c1 ∈ ~H), ((((projh ` ~H)` c1)[-h]((projh ` c0)` c1))=((projh `(_|_ ` c0))` c1)↔(((projh ` c0)` c1)[+h]((projh `(_|_ ` c0))` c1))=((projh ` ~H)` c1)), ((projh ` ~H)` c1)∈ ~H, ((projh ` c0)` c1)∈ ~H, ((projh `(_|_ ` c0))` c1)∈ ~H)
  adantl(c0 ∈ CH, c1 ∈ ~H, ((projh ` ~H)` c1)∈ ~H)
  pjcli(c1, chba)
  helch()
  pjhcl(c0, c1)
  sylan(c0 ∈ CH, c1 ∈ ~H, ((projh `(_|_ ` c0))` c1)∈ ~H, (_|_ ` c0)∈ CH)
  choccl(c0)
  pjhcl((_|_ ` c0), c1)
  hvsubadd(((projh ` ~H)` c1), ((projh ` c0)` c1), ((projh `(_|_ ` c0))` c1))

blocks.name: pjcompi
blocks.content: Component of a projection. (Contributed by NM, 31-Oct-1999.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 19-May-2014.) (New usage is discouraged.)
blocks.origin:
thm pjcompi(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, cfv(cort, c1))), wceq(cfv(cfv(cpjh, c1), co(c0, cva, c2)), c0))
  -| wcel(c1, cch)
} = {
  simpld(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, cfv(cort, c1))), wceq(cfv(cfv(cpjh, c1), co(c0, cva, c2)), c0), wceq(cfv(cfv(cpjh, cfv(cort, c1)), co(c0, cva, c2)), c2))
  mpd(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, cfv(cort, c1))), wa(wceq(cfv(cfv(cpjh, c1), co(c0, cva, c2)), c0), wceq(cfv(cfv(cpjh, cfv(cort, c1)), co(c0, cva, c2)), c2)), wceq(co(c0, cva, c2), co(cfv(cfv(cpjh, c1), co(c0, cva, c2)), cva, cfv(cfv(cpjh, cfv(cort, c1)), co(c0, cva, c2)))))
  sylancr(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, cfv(cort, c1))), wceq(co(c0, cva, c2), co(cfv(cfv(cpjh, c1), co(c0, cva, c2)), cva, cfv(cfv(cpjh, cfv(cort, c1)), co(c0, cva, c2)))), wcel(c1, cch), wcel(co(c0, cva, c2), chba))
  axpjpj(c1, co(c0, cva, c2))
  mpan2i(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, cfv(cort, c1))), wceq(co(c0, cva, c2), co(cfv(cfv(cpjh, c1), co(c0, cva, c2)), cva, cfv(cfv(cpjh, cfv(cort, c1)), co(c0, cva, c2)))), wa(wceq(cfv(cfv(cpjh, c1), co(c0, cva, c2)), c0), wceq(cfv(cfv(cpjh, cfv(cort, c1)), co(c0, cva, c2)), c2)), wceq(co(c0, cva, c2), co(c0, cva, c2)))
  eqid(co(c0, cva, c2))
  syl22anc(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, cfv(cort, c1))), wi(wa(wceq(co(c0, cva, c2), co(cfv(cfv(cpjh, c1), co(c0, cva, c2)), cva, cfv(cfv(cpjh, cfv(cort, c1)), co(c0, cva, c2)))), wceq(co(c0, cva, c2), co(c0, cva, c2))), wa(wceq(cfv(cfv(cpjh, c1), co(c0, cva, c2)), c0), wceq(cfv(cfv(cpjh, cfv(cort, c1)), co(c0, cva, c2)), c2))), wcel(cfv(cfv(cpjh, c1), co(c0, cva, c2)), c1), wcel(cfv(cfv(cpjh, cfv(cort, c1)), co(c0, cva, c2)), cfv(cort, c1)), wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, cfv(cort, c1)))
  sylancr(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, cfv(cort, c1))), wcel(cfv(cfv(cpjh, c1), co(c0, cva, c2)), c1), wcel(c1, cch), wcel(co(c0, cva, c2), chba))
  axpjcl(c1, co(c0, cva, c2))
  sylancr(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, cfv(cort, c1))), wcel(cfv(cfv(cpjh, cfv(cort, c1)), co(c0, cva, c2)), cfv(cort, c1)), wcel(cfv(cort, c1), cch), wcel(co(c0, cva, c2), chba))
  syl2an(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, cfv(cort, c1)), wcel(co(c0, cva, c2), chba), wcel(c0, chba), wcel(c2, chba))
  cheli(c0, c1)
  cheli(c2, cfv(cort, c1))
  choccli(c1)
  hvaddcl(c0, c2)
  axpjcl(cfv(cort, c1), co(c0, cva, c2))
  simpl(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, cfv(cort, c1)))
  simpr(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, cfv(cort, c1)))
  chocunii(cfv(cfv(cpjh, c1), co(c0, cva, c2)), c1, cfv(cfv(cpjh, cfv(cort, c1)), co(c0, cva, c2)), c0, c2, co(c0, cva, c2))
}

blocks.name: pjidmi
blocks.content: A projection is idempotent. Property (ii) of [Beran] p. 109. (Contributed by NM, 28-Oct-1999.) (New usage is discouraged.)

blocks.name: pjadjii
blocks.content: A projection is self-adjoint. Property (i) of [Beran] p. 109. (Contributed by NM, 30-Oct-1999.) (New usage is discouraged.)
blocks.origin:
thm pjadjii(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wceq(co(cfv(cfv(cpjh, c0), c1), csp, c2), co(c1, csp, cfv(cfv(cpjh, c0), c2)))
  -| wcel(c0, cch)
  -| wcel(c1, chba)
  -| wcel(c2, chba)
} = {
  3eqtr4i(co(cfv(cfv(cpjh, c0), c1), csp, c2), co(c1, csp, cfv(cfv(cpjh, c0), c2)), co(cfv(cfv(cpjh, c0), c1), csp, co(cfv(cfv(cpjh, c0), c2), cva, cfv(cfv(cpjh, cfv(cort, c0)), c2))), co(co(cfv(cfv(cpjh, c0), c1), cva, cfv(cfv(cpjh, cfv(cort, c0)), c1)), csp, cfv(cfv(cpjh, c0), c2)))
  3eqtr4i(co(cfv(cfv(cpjh, c0), c1), csp, co(cfv(cfv(cpjh, c0), c2), cva, cfv(cfv(cpjh, cfv(cort, c0)), c2))), co(co(cfv(cfv(cpjh, c0), c1), cva, cfv(cfv(cpjh, cfv(cort, c0)), c1)), csp, cfv(cfv(cpjh, c0), c2)), co(co(cfv(cfv(cpjh, c0), c1), csp, cfv(cfv(cpjh, c0), c2)), caddc, co(cfv(cfv(cpjh, c0), c1), csp, cfv(cfv(cpjh, cfv(cort, c0)), c2))), co(co(cfv(cfv(cpjh, c0), c1), csp, cfv(cfv(cpjh, c0), c2)), caddc, co(cfv(cfv(cpjh, cfv(cort, c0)), c1), csp, cfv(cfv(cpjh, c0), c2))))
  oveq2i(co(cfv(cfv(cpjh, c0), c1), csp, cfv(cfv(cpjh, c0), c2)), caddc, co(cfv(cfv(cpjh, c0), c1), csp, cfv(cfv(cpjh, cfv(cort, c0)), c2)), co(cfv(cfv(cpjh, cfv(cort, c0)), c1), csp, cfv(cfv(cpjh, c0), c2)))
  3eqtr4ri(co(cfv(cfv(cpjh, c0), c1), csp, cfv(cfv(cpjh, cfv(cort, c0)), c2)), co(cfv(cfv(cpjh, cfv(cort, c0)), c1), csp, cfv(cfv(cpjh, c0), c2)), cfv(ccj, co(cfv(cfv(cpjh, c0), c2), csp, cfv(cfv(cpjh, cfv(cort, c0)), c1))), nat0)
  eqtri(cfv(ccj, co(cfv(cfv(cpjh, c0), c2), csp, cfv(cfv(cpjh, cfv(cort, c0)), c1))), nat0, cfv(ccj, nat0))
  fveq2i(ccj, co(cfv(cfv(cpjh, c0), c2), csp, cfv(cfv(cpjh, cfv(cort, c0)), c1)), nat0)
  ax-mp(wceq(co(cfv(cfv(cpjh, c0), c2), csp, cfv(cfv(cpjh, cfv(cort, c0)), c1)), nat0), wcel(c0, cch))
  pjorthi(c0, c2, c1)
  cj0()
  his1i(cfv(cfv(cpjh, cfv(cort, c0)), c1), cfv(cfv(cpjh, c0), c2))
  ax-mp(wceq(co(cfv(cfv(cpjh, c0), c1), csp, cfv(cfv(cpjh, cfv(cort, c0)), c2)), nat0), wcel(c0, cch))
  pjorthi(c0, c1, c2)
  mp3an(wceq(co(cfv(cfv(cpjh, c0), c1), csp, co(cfv(cfv(cpjh, c0), c2), cva, cfv(cfv(cpjh, cfv(cort, c0)), c2))), co(co(cfv(cfv(cpjh, c0), c1), csp, cfv(cfv(cpjh, c0), c2)), caddc, co(cfv(cfv(cpjh, c0), c1), csp, cfv(cfv(cpjh, cfv(cort, c0)), c2)))), wcel(cfv(cfv(cpjh, c0), c1), chba), wcel(cfv(cfv(cpjh, c0), c2), chba), wcel(cfv(cfv(cpjh, cfv(cort, c0)), c2), chba))
  pjhclii(cfv(cort, c0), c2)
  his7(cfv(cfv(cpjh, c0), c1), cfv(cfv(cpjh, c0), c2), cfv(cfv(cpjh, cfv(cort, c0)), c2))
  mp3an(wceq(co(co(cfv(cfv(cpjh, c0), c1), cva, cfv(cfv(cpjh, cfv(cort, c0)), c1)), csp, cfv(cfv(cpjh, c0), c2)), co(co(cfv(cfv(cpjh, c0), c1), csp, cfv(cfv(cpjh, c0), c2)), caddc, co(cfv(cfv(cpjh, cfv(cort, c0)), c1), csp, cfv(cfv(cpjh, c0), c2)))), wcel(cfv(cfv(cpjh, c0), c1), chba), wcel(cfv(cfv(cpjh, cfv(cort, c0)), c1), chba), wcel(cfv(cfv(cpjh, c0), c2), chba))
  pjhclii(c0, c1)
  pjhclii(cfv(cort, c0), c1)
  choccli(c0)
  pjhclii(c0, c2)
  ax-his2(cfv(cfv(cpjh, c0), c1), cfv(cfv(cpjh, cfv(cort, c0)), c1), cfv(cfv(cpjh, c0), c2))
  oveq2i(cfv(cfv(cpjh, c0), c1), csp, c2, co(cfv(cfv(cpjh, c0), c2), cva, cfv(cfv(cpjh, cfv(cort, c0)), c2)))
  pjpji(c2, c0)
  oveq1i(c1, csp, cfv(cfv(cpjh, c0), c2), co(cfv(cfv(cpjh, c0), c1), cva, cfv(cfv(cpjh, cfv(cort, c0)), c1)))
  pjpji(c1, c0)
}

  ⊢ (((projh ` c0)` c1)[.ih]c2)=(c1[.ih]((projh ` c0)` c2))
  ⊣ c0 ∈ CH
  ⊣ c1 ∈ ~H
  ⊣ c2 ∈ ~H

  3eqtr4i((((projh ` c0)` c1)[.ih]c2), (c1[.ih]((projh ` c0)` c2)), (((projh ` c0)` c1)[.ih](((projh ` c0)` c2)[+h]((projh `(_|_ ` c0))` c2))), ((((projh ` c0)` c1)[+h]((projh `(_|_ ` c0))` c1))[.ih]((projh ` c0)` c2)))

blocks.name: pjinormii

  oveq12i(((projh `(_|_ ` c0))` c1), cmv, ((projh `(_|_ ` c2))` c1), (((projh ` ~H)` c1)[-h]((projh ` c0)` c1)), (((projh ` ~H)` c1)[-h]((projh ` c2)` c1)))
  mp2an(((projh `(_|_ ` c0))` c1)=(((projh ` ~H)` c1)[-h]((projh ` c0)` c1)), c0 ∈ CH, c1 ∈ ~H)
  pjo(c0, c1)
  mp2an(((projh `(_|_ ` c2))` c1)=(((projh ` ~H)` c1)[-h]((projh ` c2)` c1)), c2 ∈ CH, c1 ∈ ~H)
  pjo(c2, c1)

  oveq1i((((projh ` ~H)` c1)[-h]((projh ` ~H)` c1)), cmv, (((projh ` c0)` c1)[-h]((projh ` c2)` c1)), c0v)
  ax-mp((((projh ` ~H)` c1)[-h]((projh ` ~H)` c1))= 0h, ((projh ` ~H)` c1)∈ ~H)

} = {

  ssel(cfv(cort, c1), cfv(cort, c0), cfv(cfv(cpjh, cfv(cort, c1)), c2))
  mp3an1(wcel(cfv(cfv(cpjh, cfv(cort, c0)), c2), cfv(cort, c0)), wcel(cfv(cfv(cpjh, cfv(cort, c1)), c2), cfv(cort, c0)), wcel(co(cfv(cfv(cpjh, cfv(cort, c0)), c2), cmv, cfv(cfv(cpjh, cfv(cort, c1)), c2)), cfv(cort, c0)), wcel(cfv(cort, c0), csh))

  3bitrri(wceq(cfv(cfv(cpjh, c0), cfv(cfv(cpjh, c1), c2)), cfv(cfv(cpjh, c0), c2)), wcel(co(cfv(cfv(cpjh, cfv(cort, c0)), c2), cmv, cfv(cfv(cpjh, cfv(cort, c1)), c2)), cfv(cort, c0)), wceq(cfv(cfv(cpjh, c0), co(cfv(cfv(cpjh, c1), c2), cmv, cfv(cfv(cpjh, c0), c2))), c0v), wceq(cfv(cfv(cpjh, c0), cfv(cfv(cpjh, c1), c2)), cfv(cfv(cpjh, c0), cfv(cfv(cpjh, c0), c2))))
  bitri(wcel(co(cfv(cfv(cpjh, cfv(cort, c0)), c2), cmv, cfv(cfv(cpjh, cfv(cort, c1)), c2)), cfv(cort, c0)), wceq(cfv(cfv(cpjh, c0), co(cfv(cfv(cpjh, c1), c2), cmv, cfv(cfv(cpjh, c0), c2))), c0v), wcel(co(cfv(cfv(cpjh, c1), c2), cmv, cfv(cfv(cpjh, c0), c2)), cfv(cort, c0)))
  eleq1i(co(cfv(cfv(cpjh, cfv(cort, c0)), c2), cmv, cfv(cfv(cpjh, cfv(cort, c1)), c2)), cfv(cort, c0), co(cfv(cfv(cpjh, c1), c2), cmv, cfv(cfv(cpjh, c0), c2)))
  pjsslem(c0, c2, c1)

  hvsubcli(cfv(cfv(cpjh, c1), c2), cfv(cfv(cpjh, c0), c2))
  bitri(wceq(cfv(cfv(cpjh, c0), co(cfv(cfv(cpjh, c1), c2), cmv, cfv(cfv(cpjh, c0), c2))), c0v), wceq(cfv(cfv(cpjh, c0), cfv(cfv(cpjh, c1), c2)), cfv(cfv(cpjh, c0), cfv(cfv(cpjh, c0), c2))), wceq(co(cfv(cfv(cpjh, c0), cfv(cfv(cpjh, c1), c2)), cmv, cfv(cfv(cpjh, c0), cfv(cfv(cpjh, c0), c2))), c0v))
  eqeq1i(cfv(cfv(cpjh, c0), co(cfv(cfv(cpjh, c1), c2), cmv, cfv(cfv(cpjh, c0), c2))), c0v, co(cfv(cfv(cpjh, c0), cfv(cfv(cpjh, c1), c2)), cmv, cfv(cfv(cpjh, c0), cfv(cfv(cpjh, c0), c2))))

  mp3an1(((projh `(_|_ ` c0))` c2)∈(_|_ ` c0), ((projh `(_|_ ` c1))` c2)∈(_|_ ` c0), (((projh `(_|_ ` c0))` c2)[-h]((projh `(_|_ ` c1))` c2))∈(_|_ ` c0), (_|_ ` c0)∈ SH)
  chshii((_|_ ` c0))
  choccli(c0)

  bitri((((projh `(_|_ ` c0))` c2)[-h]((projh `(_|_ ` c1))` c2))∈(_|_ ` c0), ((projh ` c0)`(((projh ` c1)` c2)[-h]((projh ` c0)` c2)))= 0h, (((projh ` c1)` c2)[-h]((projh ` c0)` c2))∈(_|_ ` c0))

  hvsubcli(((projh ` c1)` c2), ((projh ` c0)` c2))
  bitri(((projh ` c0)`(((projh ` c1)` c2)[-h]((projh ` c0)` c2)))= 0h, ((projh ` c0)`((projh ` c1)` c2))=((projh ` c0)`((projh ` c0)` c2)), (((projh ` c0)`((projh ` c1)` c2))[-h]((projh ` c0)`((projh ` c0)` c2)))= 0h)

  oveq2i(cneg(nat1), csm, cfv(cfv(cpjh, cin(c1, cfv(cort, c0))), cfv(cfv(cpjh, c0), c2)), c0v)
  mpbi(wceq(cfv(cfv(cpjh, cin(c1, cfv(cort, c0))), cfv(cfv(cpjh, c0), c2)), c0v), wcel(cfv(cfv(cpjh, c0), c2), cfv(cort, cin(c1, cfv(cort, c0)))))

blocks.name: pjid

  -| wcel(c2, cch)
} = {
  eqeltrd(cfv(cfv(cpjh, c1), c0), cfv(cort, cin(c1, c2)), co(c0, cmv, cfv(cfv(cpjh, cfv(cort, c1)), c0)), wcel(c0, cfv(cort, cin(c1, c2))))
  sylancr(wcel(c0, cfv(cort, cin(c1, c2))), wceq(cfv(cfv(cpjh, c1), c0), co(c0, cmv, cfv(cfv(cpjh, cfv(cort, c1)), c0))), wcel(c1, cch), wcel(c0, chba))

  sseldi(cfv(cfv(cpjh, cfv(cort, c1)), c0), cfv(cort, cin(c1, c2)), cfv(cort, c1), wcel(c0, cfv(cort, cin(c1, c2))))

  syl(wcel(c0, cfv(cort, cin(c1, c2))), wcel(cfv(cfv(cpjh, cfv(cort, c1)), c0), cfv(cort, c1)), wcel(c0, chba))

  shsubcl(cfv(cort, cin(c1, c2)), c0, cfv(cfv(cpjh, cfv(cort, c1)), c0))
}

thm pjjsi(setvar s0, class c0, class c1) {
  ⊢ (∀(s0 ∈(c0[vH]c1),((projh `(_|_ ` c0))` s0)∈ c1)→(c0[vH]c1)=(c0[+H]c1))
  ⊣ c0 ∈ CH
  ⊣ c1 ∈ SH
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
} = {
  sylibr(∀(s0 ∈(c0[vH]c1),((projh `(_|_ ` c0))` s0)∈ c1), (c0[vH]c1)=(c0[+H]c1), ((c0[vH]c1)⊆(c0[+H]c1)∧(c0[+H]c1)⊆(c0[vH]c1)))
  jctir(∀(s0 ∈(c0[vH]c1),((projh `(_|_ ` c0))` s0)∈ c1), (c0[vH]c1)⊆(c0[+H]c1), (c0[+H]c1)⊆(c0[vH]c1))
  ssrdv(hs0, (c0[vH]c1), (c0[+H]c1), ∀(s0 ∈(c0[vH]c1),((projh `(_|_ ` c0))` s0)∈ c1))
  syldc(∀(s0 ∈(c0[vH]c1),((projh `(_|_ ` c0))` s0)∈ c1), hs0 ∈(c0[vH]c1), hs0 ∈(c0[+H]c1), ((projh `(_|_ ` c0))` hs0)∈ c1)
  rspcv(s0, hs0, (c0[vH]c1), ((projh `(_|_ ` c0))` s0)∈ c1, ((projh `(_|_ ` c0))` hs0)∈ c1)
  eleq1d(((projh `(_|_ ` c0))` s0), c1, ((projh `(_|_ ` c0))` hs0), s0 = hs0)
  fveq2(s0, hs0, (projh `(_|_ ` c0)))
  ex(hs0 ∈(c0[vH]c1), ((projh `(_|_ ` c0))` hs0)∈ c1, hs0 ∈(c0[+H]c1))
  sylibr((hs0 ∈(c0[vH]c1)∧((projh `(_|_ ` c0))` hs0)∈ c1), hs0 ∈(c0[+H]c1), ∃(hs1 ∈ c0, ∃(hs2 ∈ c1, hs0 =(hs1[+h]hs2))))
  syl((hs0 ∈(c0[vH]c1)∧((projh `(_|_ ` c0))` hs0)∈ c1), ∃(hs1 ∈ c0, ∃(hs2 ∈ c1, hs0 =(hs1[+h]hs2))), ((((projh ` c0)` hs0)∈ c0 ∧((projh `(_|_ ` c0))` hs0)∈ c1)∧ hs0 =(((projh ` c0)` hs0)[+h]((projh `(_|_ ` c0))` hs0))))
  sylan(hs0 ∈(c0[vH]c1), ((projh `(_|_ ` c0))` hs0)∈ c1, ((((projh ` c0)` hs0)∈ c0 ∧((projh `(_|_ ` c0))` hs0)∈ c1)∧ hs0 =(((projh ` c0)` hs0)[+h]((projh `(_|_ ` c0))` hs0))), hs0 ∈ ~H)
  cheli(hs0, (c0[vH]c1))
  shjcli(c0, c1)
  jca((hs0 ∈ ~H ∧((projh `(_|_ ` c0))` hs0)∈ c1), (((projh ` c0)` hs0)∈ c0 ∧((projh `(_|_ ` c0))` hs0)∈ c1), hs0 =(((projh ` c0)` hs0)[+h]((projh `(_|_ ` c0))` hs0)))
  anim1i(hs0 ∈ ~H, ((projh `(_|_ ` c0))` hs0)∈ c1, ((projh ` c0)` hs0)∈ c0)
  pjcli(hs0, c0)
  adantr(hs0 ∈ ~H, ((projh `(_|_ ` c0))` hs0)∈ c1, hs0 =(((projh ` c0)` hs0)[+h]((projh `(_|_ ` c0))` hs0)))
  mpan(hs0 ∈ ~H, hs0 =(((projh ` c0)` hs0)[+h]((projh `(_|_ ` c0))` hs0)), c0 ∈ CH)
  axpjpj(c0, hs0)
  3expa(((projh ` c0)` hs0)∈ c0, ((projh `(_|_ ` c0))` hs0)∈ c1, hs0 =(((projh ` c0)` hs0)[+h]((projh `(_|_ ` c0))` hs0)), ∃(hs1 ∈ c0, ∃(hs2 ∈ c1, hs0 =(hs1[+h]hs2))))
  rspceov(hs1, hs2, ((projh ` c0)` hs0), c0, ((projh `(_|_ ` c0))` hs0), c1, hs0, cva)
  shseli(hs1, hs2, hs0, c0, c1)

thm pjsumi(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, chba), wi(wss(c1, cfv(cort, c2)), wceq(cfv(cfv(cpjh, co(c1, cph, c2)), c0), co(cfv(cfv(cpjh, c1), c0), cva, cfv(cfv(cpjh, c2), c0)))))

  adantl(c0 ∈ CH, c1 ∈ CH, (_|_ ` ran((projh ` c1)))=(_|_ ` c1))

  adantr((c0 ∈ CH ∧ c1 ∈ CH ∧ c2 ∈ ~H), ran((projh ` c0))⊆(_|_ ` ran((projh ` c1))), ran((projh ` c1))∈ SH)

  chsh(ran((projh ` c1)))
  simpr((c0 ∈ CH ∧ c1 ∈ CH ∧ c2 ∈ ~H), ran((projh ` c0))⊆(_|_ ` ran((projh ` c1))))
  adantr((c0 ∈ CH ∧ c1 ∈ CH ∧ c2 ∈ ~H), ran((projh ` c0))⊆(_|_ ` ran((projh ` c1))), (((projh ` c0)` c2)∈ ran((projh ` c0))∧((projh ` c1)` c2)∈ ran((projh ` c1))))
  jca((c0 ∈ CH ∧ c1 ∈ CH ∧ c2 ∈ ~H), ((projh ` c0)` c2)∈ ran((projh ` c0)), ((projh ` c1)` c2)∈ ran((projh ` c1)))
  3adant2(c0 ∈ CH, c1 ∈ CH, c2 ∈ ~H, ((projh ` c0)` c2)∈ ran((projh ` c0)))
  sylan(c0 ∈ CH, c2 ∈ ~H, ((projh ` c0)` c2)∈ ran((projh ` c0)), (projh ` c0)[Fn]~H)

blocks.name: pjnormi
blocks.content: The norm of the projection is less than or equal to the norm. (Contributed by NM, 27-Oct-1999.) (New usage is discouraged.)
blocks.origin:
thm pjnormi(class c0, class c1) {
  |- wbr(cfv(cno, cfv(cfv(cpjh, c0), c1)), cle, cfv(cno, c1))
  -| wcel(c0, cch)
  -| wcel(c1, chba)
} = {
  breqtrri(cfv(cno, cfv(cfv(cpjh, c0), c1)), cle, cfv(cno, c1), cfv(cno, co(cfv(cfv(cpjh, c0), c1), cva, cfv(cfv(cpjh, cfv(cort, c0)), c1))))
  mp2(wbr(cfv(cno, cfv(cfv(cpjh, c0), c1)), cle, cfv(cno, co(cfv(cfv(cpjh, c0), c1), cva, cfv(cfv(cpjh, cfv(cort, c0)), c1)))), wa(wcel(cfv(cfv(cpjh, c0), c1), chba), wcel(cfv(cfv(cpjh, cfv(cort, c0)), c1), chba)), wceq(co(cfv(cfv(cpjh, c0), c1), csp, cfv(cfv(cpjh, cfv(cort, c0)), c1)), nat0))
  pm3.2i(wcel(cfv(cfv(cpjh, c0), c1), chba), wcel(cfv(cfv(cpjh, cfv(cort, c0)), c1), chba))
  pjhclii(c0, c1)
  pjhclii(cfv(cort, c0), c1)
  choccli(c0)
  ax-mp(wceq(co(cfv(cfv(cpjh, c0), c1), csp, cfv(cfv(cpjh, cfv(cort, c0)), c1)), nat0), wcel(c0, cch))
  pjorthi(c0, c1, c1)
  normpyc(cfv(cfv(cpjh, c0), c1), cfv(cfv(cpjh, cfv(cort, c0)), c1))
  fveq2i(cno, c1, co(cfv(cfv(cpjh, c0), c1), cva, cfv(cfv(cpjh, cfv(cort, c0)), c1)))

  pjnorm(c0, c1)
  con1bid(wa(wcel(c0, cch), wcel(c1, chba)), wbr(cfv(cno, cfv(cfv(cpjh, c0), c1)), clt, cfv(cno, c1)), wcel(c1, c0))
  pjnel(c0, c1)
}

  3bitr2rd((c0 ∈ CH ∧ c1 ∈ ~H), c1 ∈ c0, (normh `((projh ` c0)` c1))=(normh ` c1), ((normh `((projh ` c0)` c1))[≤](normh ` c1)∧ ¬(normh `((projh ` c0)` c1))[<](normh ` c1)), ¬(normh `((projh ` c0)` c1))[<](normh ` c1))
  eqleltd((normh `((projh ` c0)` c1)), (normh ` c1), (c0 ∈ CH ∧ c1 ∈ ~H))
  syl((c0 ∈ CH ∧ c1 ∈ ~H), (normh `((projh ` c0)` c1))∈ ℝ, ((projh ` c0)` c1)∈ ~H)
  pjhcl(c0, c1)

  normcl(c1)

  pjnorm(c0, c1)
